// AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED: location from saved link.
Map.setCenter(70.1926816124244, 43.608293004138034, 7)

// Make a button widget.
var button = ui.Button('Click me!');

// Set a callback function to run when the
// button is clicked.
button.onClick(function() {
  print('Hello, world!');
});

// Display the button in the console.
print(button);
